painJournalQuestions.question: How is your pain today?
painJournalQuestions.helpText: 0 is no pain, 10 is pain as bad as you can imagine.

questions.question: What were you doing when your pain increased?
questions.helpText: Walking down the street one the way to work.

questions.question: What were you feeling?
questions.helpText: I was feeling anxious because I was running late.

painJournalQuestions.question: I tried the following coping strategies:

options.option: I didn't try any coping strategies

painJournalQuestions.question: Anything else you'd like to add?
painJournalQuestions.helpText: Enter some notes that will be helpful to reflect on.

painJournalQuestions.question: How was your pain after the episode?
painJournalQuestions.helpText: 0 is no pain, 10 is pain as bad as you can imagine.
